channel.title: Client help (cache) (317)
channel.description: i need help with my cache if you have anything idc what it is please post so far i got cache all in one file zip etc added on drop-box it will download like some what then pop up update error then stop connection error idk if files are a post to be 0kb is mine a post to be like this downloadcache("https://www.dropbox.com/s/s5vn403ekmrkix2/servername_file_store32.zip", "servername_file_store32.zip", "", "CACHE"); think something is a post go in between them "" but idk what

item.title: Client help (cache) (317)
item.dc:creator: @thomashawkins4866 thomashawkins4866
item.description:
@thomashawkins4866 wrote:

i need help with my cache if you have anything idc what it is please post
so far i got
cache all in one file zip etc
added on drop-box
it will download like some what then pop up update error then stop connection error
idk if files are a post to be 0kb
is mine a post to be like this
downloadcache(“https://www.dropbox.com/s/s5vn403ekmrkix2/servername_file_store32.zip”, “servername_file_store32.zip”, “”, “CACHE”);
think something is a post go in between them “” but idk what

Read full topic
